name: All 4 one 4 all
description:
For GMTK Gamejam 2019, For fun

Everything comes from The One

One drag, One sphere. Things happen.

  • Start with 10 energy cores
  • Inject cores to improve the structure strength
  • Bounce and many other obstacle may harm your spheres
  • Sphere can split when breaking
  • Sphere can also restores when impact with each other
  • Restoration reinforce the structure
  • Collect all stars in 11 levels
  • Recycle energy from spheres at the end of each level

Can u make to the end?
